C

C - Static variable in class CST8221C4.ModelConnect4
 
checkDraw() - Method in class CST8221C4.ModelConnect4
This functions checks if a draw has occurred within the game board, a draw state only occurs if there is no more space for tokens in the columns.
checkWinner() - Method in class CST8221C4.ModelConnect4
This function checks if a winning state has occurred within the game.
Connect4 - Class in CST8221C4
This class represents the View of the Connect 4 GUI.
Connect4() - Constructor for class CST8221C4.Connect4
Default constructor which initializes the buttons of the game board.
controller - Variable in class CST8221C4.Connect4
 
ControllerConnect4 - Class in CST8221C4
This class represents the ControllerConnect4 which is the Controller, which handles events generated by user interactions with the GUI.
ControllerConnect4(Connect4) - Constructor for class CST8221C4.ControllerConnect4
Overloaded constructor which initializes the view, model and game board.
createAndShowGUI() - Method in class CST8221C4.Connect4
Sets the layout and dimension of the game, and adds the panels in the frame.
createTokenIcon(int) - Method in class CST8221C4.Connect4
Creates the graphics and sets the size for the tokens.
CST8221C4 - package CST8221C4
 
currentPlayer - Variable in class CST8221C4.ModelConnect4
